text.title: Day & Night Fun Pass
text.subtitle: 6 days of connection, celebration, and discovery.

features.name: Choose Your Own Hotel
features.description: Enjoy the freedom to stay wherever you'd like—no designated hotel or shuttle.

features.name: Afternoon to Late Night Access
features.description: Your ticket covers everything from immersive workshops and ceremonies to live music and late-night magic.

features.name: All Meals & Drinks
features.description: Shared meals, refreshing beverages, and community tables make every bite part of the celebration.

features.name: Festival Grounds Access
features.description: Explore the château’s gardens, stages, lounges, and creative spaces—all included in one pass.

features.name: Plan Ahead
features.description: Nearby hotels and rental cars are limited. Book accommodations and transportation as soon as you secure your pass.

disclaimer: Choose your own accommodations—French hotels start at just $45 per night. No designated hotel or shuttle.
